entry.title: 🧑‍💻About
entry.content:
Hi, welcome to H&E Studio💻

H&E Studio is a small studio specializing in developing mini-games/mini-programs/H5/public accounts/Apps. We are not only “prolific” but also “refined.” We can talk about “sentiments” and show off our cases.

Most of our clients are small and medium-sized startups. We tailor-make Apps/public accounts/mini-programs, etc., according to the actual business of our clients. We continuously update and maintain applications with the business growth of our clients, and we have accumulated a group of long-term loyal customers.

👉We have no fancy publicity and packaging, only believe that quality and word of mouth are the best publicity

Whatever application you need, we can provide customized solutions

📱

  • comfyui automation, open-source AI deployment application
  • Helping small and medium-sized companies build internal automation systems
  • Office automation (Python + Excel + process RPA), etc.
  • Technology selection consultant (such as whether to use a low-code platform, whether to use a certain database)
  • Android/IOS App design and development
  • WeChat/Alipay/TikTok mini-program design and development
  • Public account/H5 design and development
  • Python script/assistant development, browser plug-in development/grease monkey development
  • Around the above related businesses, including but not limited to: domain name registration, server purchase, ICP filing, server deployment/optimization, HTTPS deployment, enterprise email, etc.

🎮

  • Godot/Cocos/Unity

Thank you for your attention and support

  • 需求文档是什么?
  • 项目合作须知

entry.title: 🤝项目合作须知 - 💡联系我们之前
entry.content:
为了节省双方的时间和精力,尽快明确您的需求,给出合理的报价与工时,希望您在联系我们之前,先将您要开发的应用整理出一份需求文档

书写需求文档的过程会有利于您复盘自己的项目,从而更加明确您的项目预期,拥有一份清晰的需求文档也更方便您”货比三家”,减少对接过程中因需求模棱两可而产生的误会

如果您不知道如何书写需求文档,下面是一些例子(非必须,仅供参考)

  • 项目背景和目标:介绍这个项目的起因和需要解决的问题,以及项目的整体目标

  • 功能需求:列出系统需要实现的功能点,包括用户界面/角色权限/处理逻辑等

  • 非功能需求:列出系统的性能指标/安全要求/可用性/可靠性/易用性等非功能性要求

  • 界面设计需求:描述系统用户界面的设计风格/布局/图标和颜色等

  • 测试计划和验收标准:定义系统测试计划和验收标准,确保开发完成后可以进行有效的测试

  • 实现约束和限制:列出任何技术上的限制,如语言/框架和操作系统等

  • 时间规划和里程碑:明确项目的时间表和里程碑,确保按时完成并达到预期效果

合作流程

  1. 根据您的需求文档,进一步沟通明确需求后,我们给出报价
  2. 签署合同
  3. 支付定金
  4. 设计/开发
  5. 测试验收
  6. 支付余款
  7. 上线运行
  8. 根据项目规模提供1-6个月的免费维护(无新需求改动)
  9. 后期可按工时提供长期技术支持,包括需求更新/应用升级维护
